pages.text: The Beckon Harbringer is a parasitic block that collects biomass to provide a Stage I Beckon, much like a Dispatcher Nidus. The block does not appear to collect souls from nearby parasites, however, instead relying on Tier 2 or higher Vagrants to provide the required flesh. It appears only Tier 3 Vagrants have enough internal storage to use it, however.

What is odd, however, is that the resulting Beckon does not seem to be composed of the flesh given to the block. It appears, instead, that the Beckon is given in exchange by something else.$(br2)$(#630000)I can use this to get a Beckon of my own, which will net point credit whenever it infests blocks.
$(#630000)I should also be able to do this with a Dispatcher Nidus, although there doesn't seem to be any credit it can provide. Just convenience, which is useful regardless.
If no Beckon Membranes are available, Dispatcher Membranes can be used instead.
